quote: ॐ असतो मा सद्गमय । तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय । मृत्योर्मा अमृतं गमय । ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः ॥
author: Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

quote: Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: A person should not be too honest.
author: Chanakya

quote: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourself.
author: Chanakya

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from will.
author: Chanakya

quote: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
author: Shrimad Bhagavad Gita

quote: Change is the law of the universe.
author: Shrimad Bhagavad Gita

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future.
author: Buddha

quote: Be water, my friend.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Knowing is not enough, we must apply.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Every now and then go away, have a little relaxation, for when you come back to your work your judgment will be surer.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Wisdom is knowing how little we know.
author: J. Krishnamurti

quote: Truth is a pathless land.
author: J. Krishnamurti

quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
author: J. Krishnamurti

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Know thyself.
author: Delphic Maxim

quote: Man is the measure of all things.
author: Protagoras

quote: Change alone is unchanging.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Happiness lies in virtuous activity.
author: Aristotle

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

quote: Fortune favors the bold.
author: Virgil

quote: Life must be understood backwards. But it must be lived forwards.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Liberty consists in doing what one desires.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
author: Robert Pirsig

quote: The obstacle is the path.
author: Zen Koan

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Move fast and break things.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Risk more than others think is safe.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: We are what we repeatedly do.
author: Aristotle

quote: The first draft of anything is shit.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: To thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
author: Voltaire

quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Action expresses priorities.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Ask yourself whether what you’re doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.
author: Paulo Coelho
